sentences.en: Adventurous travelers can go heli-skiing, paragliding and bungee jumping.
sentences.cn: 好冒险的旅行者可以去高山滑雪，空中滑翔跳伞和蹦极。

sentences.en: Glidings, including hang gliding and paragliding, are gaining popularity both as competitive and spectator sports.
sentences.cn: 滑翔运动, 包括悬挂式和伞翼滑翔,作为竞赛和观赏体育正越来越普及.

sentences.en: He warns that there are some important safety rules for paragliding.
sentences.cn: 他提醒说滑翔运动里有一些非常重要的安全规则.

sentences.en: Keith Warner goes paragliding in his free time.
sentences.cn: 基思?华纳空闲时会去做滑翔运动.

sentences.en: Such water sports as motorboat , diving, paragliding etc. will surely light up your holidays.
sentences.cn: 摩托艇 、 潜水 、 拖曳伞等丰富的海上运动,定能让你感受到精彩刺激.

trans.tran_en: a sport in which you jump off a hill or out of a plane and use a  parachute  to fly for long distances before floating back down to the ground
